Package lt.galdebar.monmonmvc.api

Class ShoppingItemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lt.galdebar.monmonmvc.api.ShoppingItemController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/shoppingitems")
public class ShoppingItemController
extends java.lang.Object
    Shopping Item Controller.
    Handles Shopping item CRUD operations

    • Method Detail

      • getItemsByCategory

        @GetMapping("getByCategory")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getItemsByCategory​(@RequestParam(value="shoppingItemCategory",required=false)
                                                           java.lang.String requestedCategory)
        Gets items by category.
        GET request
        Requires valid Authorization Token in request header
        Header format:
        {"Authorization":"Bearer [token]"}
        Parameters:
        requestedCategory - the requested category
        Returns:
        Array of items matching the category.
        Returns empty array if category match not found against DB.
        Returns HTTP 400 if request is empty
        Returns HTTP 403 if Authorization token is
        • Empty
        • Invalid
        • Expired

      • getAllItems

        @CrossOrigin
@GetMapping("getAll")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAllItems()
        Gets all items for the current user.
        GET request
        Requires valid Authorization Token in request header
        Header format:
        {"Authorization":"Bearer [token]"}
        Returns:
        Array of ShoppingItems (if user has added any)
        Returns HTTP 403 if Authorization token is
        • Empty
        • Invalid
        • Expired

      • addItem

        @CrossOrigin
@PostMapping("/additem")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity addItem​(@RequestBody
                                                ShoppingItemDTO shoppingItemDTO)
        Add ShoppingItem.
        POST request
        Requires valid Authorization Token in request header
        Header format:
        {"Authorization":"Bearer [token]"}
        Parameters:
        shoppingItemDTO - Must contain item name at least.
        Can have all other fields (Category, quantity, isInCart, comment).
        Full Shopping Item JSON example:
        {
        "id": "5e6260b97b7ecd1adf7c910e",
        "itemName": "Beer",
        "itemCategory": "Beverages",
        "quantity": 0,
        "comment": "",
        "isInCart": false
        }
        Returns:
        Same shopping item with assigned id.
        If category was empty in the request, item will be assigned a category according to request item name.
        If no appropriate category was found, item will be assigned "Uncategorized" category.
        Returns HTTP 400 if other request item
        • Is empty
        • Has empty itemName field
        Returns HTTP 403 if Authorization token is
        • Empty
        • Invalid
        • Expired

      • updateItem

        @CrossOrigin
@PutMapping("updateitem")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updateItem​(@RequestBody
                                                   ShoppingItemDTO shoppingItemDTO)
        Update Shopping Item.
        {"Authorization":"Bearer [token]"}
        Requires valid Authorization Token in request header
        Header format:
        {Authorization:Bearer [token]}
        Full Shopping Item JSON example:
        Parameters:
        shoppingItemDTO - Must contain id. All other fields are optional, but the item will be updated with empty fields.
        Full Shopping Item JSON example:
        {
        "id": "5e6260b97b7ecd1adf7c910e",
        "itemName": "Beer",
        "itemCategory": "Beverages",
        "quantity": 0,
        "comment": "",
        "isInCart": false
        }
        Returns:
        The same updated item.
        Returns HTTP 400 if other request item
        • Is empty
        • Has empty itemName field
        • Item not found (id field is empty or invalid)
        Returns HTTP 403 if Authorization token is
        • Empty
        • Invalid
        • Expired

      • updateItems

        @CrossOrigin
@PutMapping("/updateitems")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updateItems​(@RequestBody
                                                    java.util.List<ShoppingItemDTO> shoppingItemDTOS)
        Update Multiple Shopping Items.
        PUT request
        Requires valid Authorization Token in request header
        Header format:
        {"Authorization":"Bearer [token]"}
        Parameters:
        shoppingItemDTOS - Array of Shopping Items. Each item must contain id. All other fields are optional, but the item will be updated with empty fields.
        Full Shopping Item JSON example:
        {
        "id": "5e6260b97b7ecd1adf7c910e",
        "itemName": "Beer",
        "itemCategory": "Beverages",
        "quantity": 0,
        "comment": "",
        "isInCart": false
        }
        Returns:
        Array of the same updated items.
        Returns HTTP 400 if any of the array items
        • Is empty
        • Has empty itemName field
        • Item not found (id field is empty or invalid)
        Returns HTTP 403 if Authorization token is
        • Empty
        • Invalid
        • Expired

      • deleteById

        @CrossOrigin
@DeleteMapping("deleteitem")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deleteById​(@RequestBody
                                                   ShoppingItemDTO shoppingItemDTO)
        Delete Shopping Item.
        DELETE request
        Requires valid Authorization Token in request header
        Header format:
        {"Authorization":"Bearer [token]"}
        Parameters:
        shoppingItemDTO - Must have valid id. All other fields are ignored.
        Full Shopping Item JSON example:
        {
        "id": "5e6260b97b7ecd1adf7c910e",
        "itemName": "Beer",
        "itemCategory": "Beverages",
        "quantity": 0,
        "comment": "",
        "isInCart": false
        }
        Returns:
        HTTP Ok if deletion successful.
        Returns HTTP 400 if any of the array items
        • Is empty
        • Has empty itemName field
        • Item not found (id field is empty or invalid)
        Returns HTTP 403 if Authorization token is
        • Empty
        • Invalid
        • Expired

      • deleteItems

        @CrossOrigin
@DeleteMapping("/deleteitems")
org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deleteItems​(@RequestBody
                                                    java.util.List<ShoppingItemDTO> shoppingItemDTOS)
        Delete Multiple Shopping Items.
        DELETE request
        Requires valid Authorization Token in request header
        Header format:
        {"Authorization":"Bearer [token]"}
        Parameters:
        shoppingItemDTOS - Array of Shopping items. Each item must have valid id. All other fields are ignored.
        Full Shopping Item JSON example:
        {
        "id": "5e6260b97b7ecd1adf7c910e",
        "itemName": "Beer",
        "itemCategory": "Beverages",
        "quantity": 0,
        "comment": "",
        "isInCart": false
        }
        Returns:
        HTTP Ok if deletion successful.
        Returns HTTP 400 if any of the array items
        • Is empty
        • Has empty itemName field
        • Item not found (id field is empty or invalid)
        Returns HTTP 403 if Authorization token is
        • Empty
        • Invalid
        • Expired
